import React, { Component } from 'react' import Navbar2 from './Navbar2' import Footer from './Footer' import { Breadcrumb, Form, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../CSS/style.css' export default class Contact extends Component { state = { name: null, email:null, subject: "Choose:", message: null } submit = () => { e.preventDefault(); fetch('http://localhost:8080/contact',{ method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify(this.state), headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, }).then( (response) => (response.json()) ).then((response)=>{ if (response.status === 'success'){ alert("Message Sent."); this.resetForm() }else if(response.status === 'fail'){ alert("Message failed to send.") } }) } render() { return (
Home
Contact Us
 Data

Contact us Feel free to ask any query

this.setState({name: e.target.value})} />
this.setState({email: e.target.value})} />
this.setState({subject: e.target.value})} >
